snippet: Rochelle Sterling, wife of the beleaguered Donald Sterling, said she would fight to maintain ownership of the franchise, saying, “If the roles were reversed, would they take the team away from the man?”
abstract: Excerpts of interview with Rochelle Sterling, who as co-owner of Los Angeles Clippers has largely been a silent partner but is now speaking out as the NBA pushes for the permanent removal of her husband Donald Sterling; she vows to fight the league if it tries to force her out.

byline.contributor: This interview has been condensed and edited.

lead_paragraph: Rochelle Sterling, wife of the beleaguered Donald Sterling, said she would fight to maintain ownership of the franchise, saying, “If the roles were reversed, would they take the team away from the man?”

headline.seo: Rochelle Sterling Tells Her Side of the Story
headline.main: Clippers’ Co-Owner: ‘I Didn’t Do Anything Wrong’
headline.print_headline: Her Side: ‘I Didn’t Do Anything Wrong’
